en.bdb: Some are lovers of beautiful young women; emotional attachment to Maya is very dear to them. The unfortunate self-willed manmukhs remain asleep.
en.ms: Some are the lovers of damsels and sweet to them is the love of wealth; Such unlucky apostates remain asleep.
